thread.title: Neil Stewart
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by Neil Stewart

author: Neil Stewart
title: Neil Stewart
text:
Hi,
Ink Station side of things on our first order was very good.
However Aust Post put the ink in our small letterbox, which we don't use as we have a PO Box, luckily we looked in there.
We will speak to Aust Post, because whilst we specified delivery to property 13C, we have a Redirection order in plate to divert everything to a PO Box.
We will state the PO Box as our delivery address rather than 13C in the future.
It's an Aust Post problem, we'll contact them.
Thanks for your prompt service
Neil Stewart
